scripts.build:production: npm run optimize && NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.deploy:quick: git add . && git commit -m "Quick deploy: $(date)" && git push origin main && echo '🚀 Quick deployment initiated!'
scripts.deploy:message: git add . && echo 'Enter commit message:' && read msg && git commit -m "$msg" && git push origin main && echo '📝 Custom deployment complete!'
scripts.deploy:verify: echo '📊 Git Status:' && git status --porcelain && echo '🌐 Live Site: https://caly-base.vercel.app/' && echo '✅ Last Commit:' && git log -1 --oneline
scripts.deploy:watch: echo '🔄 Starting deployment watcher...' && fswatch -o . | xargs -n1 -I{} npm run deploy:quick
scripts.setup:hooks:
echo '🔧 Setting up deployment hooks...' && mkdir -p .git/hooks && echo '#!/bin/sh
npm run deploy:verify' > .git/hooks/post-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/post-commit && echo '✅ Deployment hooks installed!'
